fields.title: Urban Mass Transportation Administration Financial and Operating Data, 1982 (Transition)

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This database is an on-going series of information on planning by public transit systems, Federal, state, and local governments, and the public. For the public sector, it provides information on investment decisions, by all levels of government. It is a unique resource for public transit management, planning, policy-making, and other analytical applications.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Reporting data originally collected on forms provided by the Urban Mass Transit System.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I;
